com.glmapview

Class GLSearchOffline

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glmapview.GLSearchOffline

  • public class GLSearchOffline
extends java.lang.Object
    `GLSearchOffline` class contains a set of parameters that defines search in offline maps

    • Constructor Detail

      • GLSearchOffline

        public GLSearchOffline()

    • Method Detail

      • addNameFilter

        public void addNameFilter(java.lang.String word)
        Adds name filter (name of object contains word)
        Parameters:
        word - Word query

      • addNamesFilter

        public void addNamesFilter(java.lang.String[] words)
        Adds name filter (name of object contains ANY of word in array). If any word is found in name - we'll use this result.
        Parameters:
        words - Array of words

      • setCategories

        public void setCategories(GLSearchCategories categories)
        Sets categories that used to sort results by importance. Some categories contain score bonus. It's used to put most important results first in list.
        Parameters:
        categories - Categories container

      • setLocaleSettings

        public void setLocaleSettings(GLMapLocaleSettings localeSettings)
        Sets locale settings that used to sort results by importance. Results in user language displayed on top.
        Parameters:
        localeSettings - Language priority settings.

      • addCategoryFilter

        public void addCategoryFilter(GLSearchCategory category)
        Adds category filter. Only results with given category will be returned.
        Parameters:
        category - Category object

      • addTagFilter

        public void addTagFilter(java.lang.String tag,
                         java.lang.String[] values)
        Adds custom filter by tag (value of tag exactly matches to one of given values)
        Parameters:
        tag - Tag. e.g. "amenity"
        values - Array of values. e.g. ["bar", "pub"]

      • setLimit

        public void setLimit(int limit)
        Sets maximum number of results to fetch from map
        Parameters:
        limit - Results limit

      • setBBox

        public void setBBox(GLMapBBox bbox)
        Sets bounding box where search will be performed
        Parameters:
        bbox - Search bounding box.

      • setCenter

        public void setCenter(MapPoint center)
        Sets center of search. Distance from this center will define importance of object. Usually center is user location or center of the screen.
        Parameters:
        center - Center point.

      • start

        public void start(java.util.List customObjects,
                  GLSearchOffline.GLMapSearchCompletion callback)
        Starts search.
        Parameters:
        customObjects - Custom object to add to results
        callback - will be called when search is finished or when search needs information about custom object.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancels search operation.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
